text: You can refer to the aelf Developer Resources.Here is a guide on how to apply to be a BP: https://docs.aelf.com/quick-start/node-operators/apply-to-be-a-bp/Here is a guide on how to set up a node on Mainnet: https://docs.aelf.com/quick-start/node-operators/set-up-a-node-on-mainnet/
title: How to become a Block Producer (BP)? How to run a full node?
